name: A Totally Normal Game of Asteroids
name_original: A Totally Normal Game of Asteroids
description:
This project was made by my 11-year old son in three hours.

Grab the Growth Pellets to expand your size. But watch out! Asteroids can also expand!

Art by me (issac_the_scratcher)
Sounds by Scratch edited by me (issac_the_scratcher)
Voices by Kenny.nl
